title: @rito ... Teric  where ?
body:
git gud rito and release fab gemswag. U got 14 days or a poro will die

replies.body:
By threatening {{summoner:31}} , you threaten yourself with {{champion:201}} .

If you understand this, then carry on.
braum overrated so are poros and yordels. No juan cares as long as taric shines again.

polishes gems and throws them after you.

Y U DO DIS TO ME
Your demand is truly, truly outrageous!
it is indeed and im getting outrageously insane waiting for the fabulous gem knight to be reworked.
It is indeed, monstrous. Is that poro going to commit suicide?
not when he is with teric he gonna be imbued b4 he dies so he has to kill himself multiple times

I think they said the Taric relaunch (Sion scale) is for **end 2015 **(December/Jan 2016), and look like its the last visual upgrade for 2015.
Those unlucky champs **will have to wait more years** to get a new model and more than 9 lines quotes : {{champion:32}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:6}} .

RELEASE DATE - Taric
19. August 2009


nuff said.

They said, recently the kit is 80% done. So, I'm going to guess that it is by now, 81-87% done. Maybe more.

But his new look, visuals, and lore are supposedly at 10-30% done. Maybe more, maybe less. He's pretty close.
I actually remember "90% done", which is even better! :P :D
and yet i dont care how far it is done thou i wanna see results.

I think the 80% just means 4 of 5 abilities (passive, Q, W, E, R), I don't think you can complete one halve of an ability.
So I guess it stays at 80% 'till it's fully completed.

> [{quoted}](name=Maegges,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WzAA5yng,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-22T06:31:30.361+0000)

Your poro will have time die... sadly, reworking a champ take years here. [Taric is work in progress since 2012-2013](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3137019&page=3#post34765262){{champion:44}}
im always amazed how long this stuff takes but fans do it in a week and i wonder why they not just incorporate more fan work like the sona splash art for example was done by some 1 on deviant art.
I think that what's taking so long is them incorporating fan suggestions into Taric's rework and VU

eh no not "incorporate" just taking it 1 to 1

soon...... bump
